attributes.action: make prescriptions free for those suffering with incurable mental illnesses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, some incurable illnesses requiring regular medication are covered under the prescription exemption rules. This should be extended to cover those with mental illnesses as one of the biggest problems in mental health relief is that of medication compliance, which could be improved for many if there was not a cost attached to their continued health and ability to function in society.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
